biotools.summary: An R Package for Geneset Enrichment Workflows | Please visit https://montilab.github.io/hypeR-docs/ | hypeR currently requires the latest version of R (>= 3.6.0) to be installed directly from Github or Bioconductor. To install with R (>= 3.5.0) see below. Use with R (< 3.5.0) is not recommended
